#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
const int mod = 1000000007;
 
long long power(long long a, long long b) {
  long long res = 1;
  while(b > 0) {
    if(b & 1) res = (res * a) % mod;
    a = (a * a) % mod;
    b /= 2;
  }
  return res;
}
 
int main()
{
  long long n, k, m;
  scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &n, &k, &m);
  
  n--;
  if(k == 1) {
    printf("%lld\n", m);
  } else if(k == 2) {
    printf("%lld\n", ((2LL * n + 1) * 1LL * m) % mod);
  } else if(k == 3) {
    printf("%lld\n", ((((2LL * n) * 1LL * (n + 1) + 1) % mod) * m) % mod);
  } else if(k == 4) {
    printf("%lld\n", ((((2 * n + 1) % mod * ((2 * n * n) % mod + 2 * n + 3) % mod) % mod * power(3, mod - 2)) % mod * m) % mod);
  } else {
    printf("%lld\n", ((((2 * power(n, 4)) % mod + (4 * power(n, 3)) % mod + (10 * power(n, 2)) % mod + 8 * n + 3) % mod * power(3, mod - 2)) % mod * m) % mod);
  }
  return(0);
}
